description: Waking up after a heartbreaking loss to the New England Patriots at Super Bowl LI is brutal and we get it.
title: Comforting tweets Falcons fans need after the game
title_page: Super Bowl 2017: Comforting tweets Falcons fans need after the game
text:
Waking up after a heartbreaking loss to the New England Patriots at Super Bowl LI is brutal and we get it.
» The Falcons lose the most Atlanta game ever
To make your day a little easier, we’ve rounded up some of our favorite comforting tweets oozing love and support for Atlanta and Falcons fans around the nation.
Atlanta Falcons still love ya!!! You must Keep your heads up!! I had a great time!#EpicGame — Gucci Mane (@gucci1017) February 6, 2017
"The trials and tribulations of an Atlanta sports fan." @JohnFricke Will only be sweeter when we finally break through! Keep believing. — Paul Harvey (@HammerHarvey) February 6, 2017
Despite Atlanta’s heartbreaking loss, the Falcons and their fans have plenty to be proud of. https://t.co/sqN6HseOaE pic.twitter.com/hYryyDyUg5 — AJC (@ajc) February 6, 2017
Photos: 12 reasons for Falcons fans to rise up and cheer up https://t.co/muxOtgQt3Y pic.twitter.com/Pd4cMIPAlE — AJC Sports (@AJCsports) February 6, 2017
ATLANTA y'all played your hearts out. Hold your heads up & be ready for next year. #ThePats have been there many times. You can too! — octavia spencer (@octaviaspencer) February 6, 2017
This loss is going to be hurt for a looooooooong time, but im forever proud of Atlanta for the way they shocked the NFL this season. — Georgia Sports Now (@GASportsNow) February 6, 2017 My heart is crushed, but God has a plan for me. Blessed to play with the men on that team. — Ben Garland (@BenGarland63) February 6, 2017
Atlanta still the best city and that's not up for debate. — bae. (@bahjarodriguez) February 6, 2017
Or you can laugh through the pain, if that’s more your style.
This loss hit Atlanta so hard I swear I just drove past a Waffle House that was closed. — Lucky Lefty (@SayNoToInk) February 6, 2017
The city of Atlanta is cancelled tomorrow. The entire city — Coach Rob (@CoachRobJohnson) February 6, 2017
Golden State: "I blew a 3-1 lead."
Cleveland: "I blew a 3-1 lead."
Atlanta: "Hold my beer." — LG (@LGhail) February 6, 2017
There’s always next year, Falcons fans.
